channel.title: Quoc Phong Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content on Quoc Phong Nguyen

item.title: Education
item.description:
Doctor of Philosophy, Computer Science (2013 - 2018)

National University of Singapore, Singapore

  • SMA3 (Singapore-MIT Alliance) Fellowship.
  • Supervised by Associate Professor Bryan Kian Hsiang Low and Professor Patrick Jaillet.
  • Thesis: An Alternative Information-Theoretic Criterion for Active Learning.

Bachelor of Computer Engineering (Minor in Statistics) (2009 - 2013)

National University of Singapore, Singapore

  • Lee Kuan Yew Gold Medal for the best graduate throughout the course of study.

item.title: Experience
item.description:
Working Experience

Research Fellow [Mar. 2024 - Present]

Applied Artificial Intelligence Institute (A2I2), Deakin University

Postdoctoral Associate [Apr. 2023 - Feb. 2024]

Laboratory for Information & Decision Systems, Massachusetts Institute of Technology

  • Developing methods to facilitate the collaboration and to ensure fairness between multiple parties in solving machine learning problems, especially optimizing black box functions.

Senior Postdoctoral Fellow [Jul. 2021 - Apr. 2023]

Institute of Data Science (IDS), National University of Singapore (NUS)
